casebody.data:
SOMA TECHNOLOGY, INC.
v.
DALAMAGAS, et al. 308A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 20, 2017 Daniel F.E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Robert J. King, III, Attorney at Law, Jonathan M. Shapiro, Attorney at Law, for Soma Technology, Inc. Sam McGee, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Desai, Hiren. *146Paul J. Stevens, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Dalamagas, Photios, et al. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Plaintiff's Brief filed on the 20th of October 2017 by Defendant (Hiren Desai) :

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of October 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 15th day of December 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
